translation: When your intellect, which is perplexed by the Vedic texts you have read, stands immovable and steady in the Self, then you will attain Self-realization.
commentary: 2.53 Shrutivipratipanna perplexed by what hast heard? And thy? When when? shall stand shall stand? motionless immovable? Samadhau in the Self? Achala steady? Intelligence: intellect? Then then? Yoga Selfrealisation? You will (thou) shalt attain.Commentary When your intellect which is tossed about by the conflict of opinions regarding the Pravritti Marga (the path of action) and the Nivritti Marga (the path of retirement).
